DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare determine efficacy combine N-acetyl cysteine clomiphene citrate ( CC ) combine metformin CC infertile woman Polycystic ovary syndrome ( PCOS ) respond treatment Clomiphene alone .
DOC.brief_title: N-acetyl Cysteine Clomiphene Citrate Metformin Clomiphene Citrate Women With CC Resistant Polycystic Ovary Syndrome ( PCOS ) .
DOC.detailed_description: In combined NAC-CC group group , patient receive NAC ( 200 mg per sachet , SEDICO , Egypt ) 5-6 week 1st day spontaneous induce menstruation ( dose 1.8 g orally three divide dos , 3 sachet per dose ) . All patient group receive metformin HCl ( Cidophage® ; Chemical Industries Development , Egypt ) , 500 mg thrice daily 5-6 week 1st day spontaneous induced menstruation . Then end period , patient either group receive 100 mg CC ( Clomid® ; Global Napi Pharmaceuticals , Cairo , Egypt ) 5 day start day 3 spontaneous induce menstruation . With persistent anovulation , increase 50 mg next cycle . Patients continue treatment three successive cycle use protocol . NAC metformin stop pregnancy document .
DOC.criteria: CC resistant PCOS Congenital adrenal hyperplasia Cushing syndrome Androgen secreting tumor
